00021 
00026 #ifndef TEXTFILECHECK_H
00027 #define TEXTFILECHECK_H
00028 
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00036 class TextFileCheck
00037 {
00038 public:
00046   TextFileCheck (const char* generatedFile, const char* goldFile, const unsigned int skipLines)
00047     : m_GeneratedFile (generatedFile), m_GoldFile (goldFile), m_SkipLines (skipLines)
00048   {}
00049 
00056   bool check (std::string& errorMsg)
00057   {
00058     // Open files.
00059     std::ifstream generatedStream (m_GeneratedFile);
00060     if (! generatedStream )
00061     {
00062       errorMsg = "Unable to open generated file " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile);
00063       return false;
00064     }
00065     std::ifstream goldStream (m_GoldFile);
00066     if (! goldStream )
00067     {
00068       errorMsg = "Unable to open gold file " + std::string (m_GoldFile);
00069       return false;
00070     }
00071     unsigned int lineCount = 0;
00072     const char* lineEndings = "\r\n";
00073     std::string goldLine, generatedLine;
00074     while (! goldStream.eof() && ! goldStream.fail())
00075     {
00076       getline (goldStream, goldLine);
00077       getline (generatedStream, generatedLine);
00078       if (generatedStream.eof() && ! goldStream.eof())
00079       {
00080         errorMsg = "The generated file, " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile)
00081         + ", has fewer lines than the gold file, " + std::string (m_GoldFile);
00082         return false;
00083       }
00084       // Skip header lines which need not be equal.
00085       if (++lineCount > m_SkipLines)
00086       {
00087         // Avoid line ending hassles.
00088         goldLine = goldLine.erase (goldLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00089         generatedLine = generatedLine.erase (generatedLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00090         if (goldLine != generatedLine)
00091         {
00092           errorMsg = "Mismatch reading generated file " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile)
00093           + ":\ngold line: '" + goldLine
00094           + "'\ngenerated line: '" + generatedLine + "'";
00095           return false;
00096         }
00097       }
00098     }
00099     // The two files should reach eof at the same time.
00100     if (! generatedStream.eof())
00101     {
00102       errorMsg = "The generated file, " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile)
00103         + ", has more lines than the gold file, " + std::string (m_GoldFile);
00104       return false;
00105     }
00106 
00107     return true;
00108   }
00109 
00110 private:
00112   const char* m_GeneratedFile;
00114   const char* m_GoldFile;
00116   const unsigned int m_SkipLines;
00117 };
00118 
00119 #endif /* TEXTFILECHECK_H */
